text: Robert Chartoff (August 26, 1933 â€“ June 10, 2015) was an American movie producer and philanthropist. He was born in New York City. He was known for producing The Mechanic, Rocky, and Raging Bull. Chartoff died in Santa Monica, California from pancreatic cancer, aged 81.CNN obit. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:American philanthropists Category:Movie producers from New York City
